channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:

Display name: Quantum Workspace Data Contributor
Description: Create, read, and modify jobs and other Workspace data. This role is in preview and subject to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/c1410b24-3e69-4857-8f86-4d0a2e603250?api-version=2022-04-01
